name: delete
description:
Notes:
  • Shopper deletion is not supported in OTE
  • **shopperId** is **not the same** as **customerId**. **shopperId** is a number of max length 10 digits (*ex:* 1234567890) whereas **customerId** is a UUIDv4 (*ex:* 295e3bc3-b3b9-4d95-aae5-ede41a994d13)

shopperId.description: The ID of the shopper to delete. Must agree with the shopper id on the token or header, if present. *Note*: **shopperId** is **not the same** as **customerId**.  **shopperId** is a number of max length 10 digits (*ex:* 1234567890) whereas **customerId** is a UUIDv4 (*ex:* 295e3bc3-b3b9-4d95-aae5-ede41a994d13)

auditClientIp.description: The client IP of the user who originated the request leading to this call.
